DOC.brief_summary: The United States high prevalence obesity among country survey 2012 Organization Economic Cooperation Development . Maternal obesity link anovulation , menstrual cycle abnormality , subfertility , fetal loss , obstetrical complication congenital anomaly . Changes reproductive hormone diminish oocyte quality also demonstrate . A gap knowledge exist mechanism underlie harmful effect poorly understand specific treatment exist . This proposal test hypothesis dietary omega-3 fatty acid ( FA ) improve output hypothalamicpituitary- ovarian axis obese woman . The investigator perform paired assessment supplementation 10 obese 10 normal weight woman . To test pituitary hypothalamic output , investigator examine luteinizing hormone ( LH ) follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) responsiveness frequent blood sampling . To test corpus luteum function , investigator examine urinary reproductive hormone ( E1c , estrone conjugate , pregnanediol glucuronide ( Pdg ) ) entire menstrual cycle . The investigator ultimate goal collect preliminary data adequately power randomize control trial .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Dietary Omega-3 Fatty Acids Reproductive Hormones Obese Women
